column2: As a TIM Engineer, you likely work for TIM (Telecom Italia Mobile), one of the largest telecommunications companies in Italy     TIM offers a wide range of services, including mobile and fixed-line telephony, internet, and digital television     As a TIM Engineer, your responsibilities may vary depending on your specific role within the company       However, some common tasks and areas of expertise for TIM Engineers include:       Network Planning and Design: You might be involved in the planning and design of telecommunication networks, both for mobile and fixed-line services     This could include determining the optimal network architecture, selecting equipment and technologies, and optimizing network performance and capacity     Network Implementation and Optimization: Once the network design is finalized, you may be responsible for implementing the network infrastructure, including installing and configuring equipment, testing connectivity, and optimizing network performance     This could involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, such as field technicians and network operations center (NOC) personnel     Troubleshooting and Maintenance: As a TIM Engineer, you may be involved in diagnosing and resolving network issues, both proactively and reactively     This could include troubleshooting network outages, analyzing performance metrics, and implementing corrective measures to ensure the network operates efficiently     Network Security: In today's digital landscape, network security is crucial     You may be responsible for implementing and maintaining security measures to protect the network infrastructure from cyber threats     This could involve configuring firewalls, implementing encryption protocols, and monitoring network traffic for potential security breaches     Research and Development: TIM Engineers may also contribute to research and development efforts within the company     This could involve exploring new technologies, evaluating their potential applications, and conducting feasibility studies to enhance the company's network infrastructure and services     Collaboration and Documentation: Effective collaboration and documentation are vital in any engineering role     You may collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as software developers, project managers, and customer support, to ensure smooth operations and service delivery     Additionally, documenting network configurations, troubleshooting procedures, and best practices is essential for knowledge sharing and maintaining an organized network infrastructure

column2: We seek a self-sufficient MLOps Engineer with a deep understanding and hands-on experience in deploying Large Language Models (LLMs) into production     This role requires an individual who can independently handle the complexities of LLMs, from fine-tuning to integration with existing systems, while closely collaborating with the product and engineering teams to ensure seamless implementation and optimisation               Team           Join a team of forward-thinking software engineers and product strategists     While you will be working autonomously on the deployment and management of LLMs, coordination with our Product Management and Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) teams will be essential for integrating these models into our broader platform               Your top 3 objectives            Effective Deployment of LLMs:    Successfully deploy LLMs into production, ensuring they align with our business needs and human values.       Optimise LLM Performance:    Apply techniques such as reinforcement learning, instruction fine-tuning, and model optimization to enhance the performance and reliability of LLMs.       Integrate LLMs into Applications:    Seamlessly integrate LLMs with external applications, enabling them to contribute effectively to our suite of products.             Your top 5 responsibilities            Collaborate Scope Definition:    Engage with product team to define ML project use cases precisely, setting a clear direction for technical implementation.       Lifecycle Management:    Oversee the ML project lifecycle stages, including model selection, prompt engineering, fine-tuning, evaluation, and alignment with human feedback.       Optimize and Deploy for Inference:    Optimize LLMs for inference and deploy them into production, ensuring they meet the functional and performance criteria established during scoping.       Enhance Applications with LLMs:    Work within the software development team to tailor LLMs to our unique application requirements, ensuring that the models effectively power and enhance our products functionality and user experience.        Collaborate with the SRE Team:    Work closely with the SRE team for the integration of LLMs into our cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalability and resilience.             Your Capabilities        As an MLOps Engineer focused on LLMs, you combine deep technical expertise with a proactive approach to problem-solving. You are adept at working independently yet understand the importance of aligning your work with broader team objectives.           Must-Have (The fundamentals)           Expertise in LLM Deployment:    Extensive experience in deploying and managing Large Language Models, including all aspects of fine-tuning and integration.       Technical Proficiency:    Strong skills in machine learning frameworks, cloud computing, and interacting with external applications.       Independent Problem-Solver:    Ability to tackle challenges autonomously, applying innovative solutions to complex problems.       Continuous Learner:    Commitment to staying abreast of the latest developments in LLMs and MLOps.             Nice to Have (If you don t have it now you will after joining)           Advance Model Optimization Skills:    Knowledge of advance model fine-tuning and optimization techniques.       Collaborative Approach:    While working autonomously, the ability to effectively coordinate with other teams, like SRE, for seamless integration.       Community Engagement:    Active participation in relevant tech communities to bring in new insights and best practices.             Shape isn t the place for you if any of the following is true:         You want an easy, chilled-out role without much challenge      You like to be the smartest person in the room      You don t like continuously receiving honest candid feedback      You prefer to do your own thing rather than work with a team

Tech or equivalent) in Mechanical Engineering / Naval Architecture / Ocean     Engineering / Marine Structures / Aerodynamics / Civil /Materials and/or prior experience as design engineer. column2: Develop and prepare technical solutions and quotation proposals for new equipment, applying API 611, API 612, API 617 etc. standards to meet or exceed customer requirements. Write reports to assist sales and marketing in selling new technology and developing new markets. Computer skills including Sun and IBM networks, application programs, Word, Excel, Lotus Notes, etc.

column2: Focus on RAMS (Reliability, Availability, Maintainability, andSafety) typically involves leading and overseeing the RAMS activities withinproject or organization.          Plays a critical role in improving equipment and systemreliability and availability.          Deep understanding of engineering principles, statisticalanalysis, and risk assessment methodologies          Contribute to the success and competitiveness of theorganization by improving product performance, reducing downtime, andminimizing risks associated with system operation.              Principal Accountabilities              RAMS Analysis: Conducting advanced RAMS analysis of complexsystems, products, or projects to assess their reliability, availability,maintainability, and safety characteristics. This involves utilizingstatistical methods, reliability modeling, and other analytical techniques.          Performance Evaluation: Leading the evaluation of system orproduct performance, identifying areas for improvement, and providingrecommendations for optimizing reliability, availability, maintainability, andsafety.          Risk Management: Developing and implementing risk managementstrategies to identify potential hazards and mitigate risks to ensure safe andreliable operation of systems or products.          Failure Analysis: Conducting failure analysis to determine rootcauses of failures and implementing corrective actions to prevent futureoccurrences.          RAMS Standards and Compliance: Ensuring adherence to industrystandards, regulations, and best practices related to RAMS in the developmentand operation of systems or products.          RAMS Integration: Collaborating with cross-functional teams,including design, engineering, and project management, to integrate RAMSrequirements into the overall project objectives and decision-making process.          Documentation: Preparing comprehensive technical reports anddocumentation related to RAMS analysis, performance assessments, andimprovement initiatives.          Mentoring and Leadership: Providing guidance and mentorship tojunior RAMS engineers and other team members, fostering professional growth anddevelopment.          Continuous Improvement: Identifying opportunities for processimprovements and developing initiatives to enhance RAMS practices andmethodologies.          RAMS Training: Conducting training sessions for project teamsand stakeholders to enhance their understanding of RAMS concepts, principles,and tools.          RAMS Management: Overseeing the planning, coordination, andexecution of RAMS activities throughout the project lifecycle, ensuring thatRAMS objectives are met.          System Optimization: Collaborating with design and engineeringteams to optimize system design, maintenance strategies, and safety measuresbased on RAMS analysis outcomes.              Desired Skills:                      Bachelor of Engineering/Diploma in Engineering Degree inElectrical/Electronics discipline or its equivalent.          Possesses more than 8-10 years of working experiences in rollingstock and Reliability and Modification job function in Locomotive Maintenance.          Must have competency in Maintenance and Troubleshooting ElectricLocomotive.          Good knowledge of IT systems.          Excellent communicator, both written and oral.          People Management experience.          Well versed in Locomotive Maintenance Strategy          Experienced in Rolling stock RAMS activity.

column2: For our IE department in the Brande factory, we are looking for a motivated Industrial Engineer willing to join our team for technology-based process development       Our team consists of highly skilled people who designs and executes digital systems to support problem solving and improvement in SGRE Offshore Operations in Brande, aligned with global OPS     Further we support the production in both small and major tasks      Develop the needed infrastructure for plants for high performance and availability     Develop process control system that ensures that all bolts per connection are tightened     Develop production control system that ensures that all connections per work center are done     Develop Procedure for processes, responsibility, interfaces and competence     Write the Procedure according VDI2637-1 to fulfill APQP-4-Wind and link it to PLM process     Develop training for tightening for plant workers and key users     Creation of manual and guidelines for working with the systems     Guide the on-site experts for implementation of the concept in all N plants.     Handover digital quality customer documentation (unique selling point)     Update internal and external certification                           How to contribute to our vision                             ?           As an Industrial Engineer you will contribute in design and implementation of digital systems projects at different phases of solution investigation and feasibility study, system design, initiation and planning, implementation and control, validation and tests, closure and documentation. Furthermore, you will, participate in digital simulation, digital twin, and/or prototyping of the system with realistic connection to the actual products and processes, their standards, quality plans and environmental & safety protocols. You will also define practical steps of the final solution and the process of implementation, based on proper documentation.                           ?             As an Industrial Engineer you will also have other duties such as:                     Follow up and monitor the projects from technical/system point of view and provide proper reports on deviations with suggested modifications.                 Participate in validation and test processes with a duty of data collection, data analysis and reporting the result, accompanied by interpretative recommendations.                 Contribute in creation of and conducting trainings (both plan & content) and conduct t in relation to the systems being implemented.                 Collect and document lessons-learnt after each project/system implemented.                 Participate in general engineering activities on department level.                                 What you need to make a difference                             ?           Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change.                        ?             We are also looking for                                   An individual who has a masters degree with education/background in technical/engineering programs such as mechanical, industrial, electrical or software engineering and/or computer science       You are familiar with simulations software such as Tecnomatix, ExtendSim, etc and/or familiar with Sim programming language     You are passionate about learning more software and technology means, upon need     Knowledge and/or interest in AI concepts is a plus     You are familiar with Project Management concepts, skills and tools such as stakeholder management, risk management, crisis management, resource allocation & levelling, communication & negotiation, planning & time management, as well as systematic problem solving     You are familiar with supply management concepts such as lean, value stream mapping, layout optimization, material flow, people allocation, quality & EHS collaboration, tooling interfaces, as well as key parameters such as cycle-time, tact-time, throughput-time, etc            Having multidisciplinary mindset to be comfortable to step out into other disciplines/knowledge areas and bring in related/helpful ideas. Having scalable mindset to consider implementation of the systems both locally and globally using interfaces between plants and aligned with ONE-SGRE strategy.                  Having overview of SGRE culture, SGRE OF product, plant Brande production line and the colleague-network is a plus. Having knowledge of the systems being used in SGRE such as Team Centre, SAP, and other SGRE applications is a plus.                         Lastly, as a person enjoy being an initiator and having an entrepreneurial approach to your work, while working with a methodical, systematic and structured workstyle. You are fluent in English, reading, writing and speaking. Danish knowledge is a plus                                         ?             In return of your commitment we offer you                      Become a part of our mission for sustainability: Clean energy for generations to come.                  We are a global team of diverse colleagues who share a passion for renewable energy and have a culture of trust and empowerment to make our own ideas a reality.                  We focus on personal and professional development to grow internally within our organization.

column2: This is a permanent work from home position from anywhere in India Notice period - less than 30 Days (Immediate joiners preferred) Job Summary:  We are seeking an experienced DeltaV Batch Engineer to join our pharmaceutical manufacturing team. The ideal candidate will have 6-8 years of experience in designing, commissioning, and maintaining DeltaV DCS Batch projects. This role requires expertise in DeltaV Live, including design from P&ID, process narration, and the breakdown of devices. A strong understanding of Batch S88 Standards and proficiency in the configuration and testing of control modules, equipment modules, phases, recipes, and units within the DeltaV system is essential. Responsibilities: Lead the design and commissioning of DeltaV DCS Batch projects in compliance with industry standards and regulatory requirements. Utilize DeltaV Live for designing control systems directly from P&ID diagrams, ensuring seamless integration with the overall process design. Provide process narration and develop control strategies for various pharmaceutical manufacturing processes. Configure and test Control Modules (CM), Equipment Modules (EM), Phases, Recipes, and Units to meet the specific needs of each batch process. Perform detailed testing, validation, and troubleshooting of control system components to ensure optimal performance and quality. Manage the bulk editing of databases for import and export of data, ensuring data integrity and consistency across systems. Streamline database operations and configurations to improve efficiency and accuracy. Ensure all projects comply with industry standards, including Batch S88 Standards, and adhere to regulatory guidelines. Maintain thorough documentation of system designs, configurations, testing, and commissioning processes for compliance and audit purposes. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including process engineers, validation engineers, and quality assurance teams, to ensure project success. Provide technical support and guidance to junior engineers and operators on DeltaV systems and batch processes. Identify opportunities for process optimization and system improvements to enhance manufacturing efficiency and product quality. Stay updated on the latest advancements in DeltaV technology and industry trends to drive innovation within the organization. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in engineering, computer science, or a related field. 6-8 years of experience working with DeltaV Batch systems in the pharmaceutical industry. In-depth knowledge of DeltaV Live, including design from P&ID, process narration, and breakdown of devices. Strong understanding of Batch S88 Standards and their application in pharmaceutical manufacturing. Proficiency in configuring and testing Control Modules (CM), Equipment Modules (EM), Phases, Recipes, and Units within the DeltaV system. Experience with bulk editing of databases for import and export, as well as data management best practices. Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and troubleshooting skills. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment. Attention to detail and commitment to quality and compliance in all aspects of work.
column11: Batch S88 Standards, DeltaV, DeltaV Live, Batch

column2: Solar Sales Executive Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment and have a knack for building relationships? Ankita Renewable is seeking a driven Sales Executive with a background in field sales and a passion for solar energy solutions. Solar Sales Engineer Are you a technical whiz with a passion for sustainability? Stay up-to-date on the latest solar technologies and industry trends. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field (preferred). Minimum 2 years of experience in solar energy design or a relevant technical field. Proficiency in solar design software tools. Strong understanding of solar energy systems, electrical components, and building codes. column2: This position is for a High Voltage Direct Current (HVDC) System Study Engineer who is expected to perform studies to support HVDC project developments using simulation tools such as    PSSE and PSCAD   .      The HVDC study Engineer is required to perform power system studies to support HVDC feasibility and integration studies and is expected to take an active role as OE reviewing system studies prepared by OEMs. A minimum of 5 to 12 years experience working on similar assignment is required.         ?       Working in collaboration with the HVDC and HV Cables manager to prepare the following deliverables / provide the following engineering services (non-exhaustive):         HVDC performance specifications.     HVDC converter station and equipment specifications.     Conceptual and detailed drawings for CCHT converter stations (one-line diagrams, layout, material list).     Detailed design reviews of manufacturer s design reports and drawings.     On-site Installation and Commissioning supervision.     Detailed design of HVDC interfaces (Low, Medium and High Voltage).     High Voltage AC stations electrical design.     Factory testing supervision on behalf of Client.     Client interfacing, and providing expertise in the areas of HVDC/FACTS and HV power systems.     Assist Client in HVDC/FACTS technology selection.     Design studies (such as filter design, grounding, lightning, lighting, EMF/EMI, audible noise, cable sizing, etc).     Site visits to measure audible noise, ground resistance, harmonics, and electromagnetic fields data, etc           Requirements:           bachelors degree in Electrical Engineering, from a recognized institution (masters or PhD degree in power systems, an asset).     Minimum 5 to 10 years of relevant experience, particularly related to High Voltage DC equipment and converter stations, and High Voltage AC substations and equipment.     Comprehensive understanding of high-voltage electric networks fundamentals.     Knowledge of applicable IEC, IEEE and CSA standards.     Experience in FACTS projects (eg STATCOM), an asset.     Exceptional problem-solving and analytical capabilities with a focus achieving results.     Team player with great interpersonal, communication and presentation skills.     Client focused, highly autonomous, and ability to work under pressure.     Eligibility for registration with a Professional Order of Engineers.     Fluency in English language, both spoken and written. Additional languages will be considered an asset.     Proficiency in the following software tools (an asset): PSCAD, EMTP-RV, PSSE, CDEGS.               What We Can Offer You:             Varied, interesting and meaningful work.         A hybrid working environment with flexibility and great opportunities.         Opportunities for training and, as the team grows, career progression or sideways moves.         An opportunity to work within a large global multi-disciplinary consultancy on a mission to change the ways we approach business as usual.

Design and integration of elevator electrical subsystems, understanding control system requirements, motor & VF drive interfaces, electrical codes & application software fundamentals.     2. Developing concepts of electrical sub-system, review and create electrical component & sub-system design requirements.     3. Innovative ideas in electrical subsystems with alternative design solutions to reduce the product and process cost.     4. Propose and integrate alternative drives, machines, controllers and other electrical components in the event of product obsolescence.     5. Selection and sizing of key electrical components for the electrical sub-system designs, such as: relays, circuit breakers, switches, transformers, protection systems for both control and power circuits.     6. Support electrical system calculation and analysis for cable sizing, power converters sizing, Machine sizing, heat release calculations, power supply designs.     7. Participate in the design reviews of the electrical sub-system.     8. Understanding and performing failure and risk analysis using Otis tools PROCERT, FMEA, RAMP, RRCA, DoE, etc     9. Verifying electrical component level qualification in a system.     10. Project Planning, Global Stake holder management, Risk forecast & mitigation, effective operations management, Improve Customer MFA     11. Hands on experience in AutoCAD tool and Knowledge on the E3/EPLAN tool will be added advantage.     12. Exposure in managing the communication with global engineering teams like China, US and European countries.     13. Need to work closely with chief engineers and module owners for deploying the Standard work and design modules/solution.      14. Identify the cost reduction opportunities by value engineering process and benchmarking,      15. Good interpersonal and communication skills Creative and open mind, work hard and energetic, good teamwork and ethical behavior.                             ?           What You Will Need to be Successful     :                   1. Delivery of electrical components & sub-system design meeting OTIS standards of safety, quality and design.     2. Provide timely trouble shooting support in resolution of technical problems related to electrical system and components.     3. Deliver electrical designs on time meeting requirements and within cost targets.     4. Improvement in design quality through the reduction in design errors and escapes to the field.     5. BE with 5 years of experience.     6. Elevator experience of 2 years will be added advantage

column2: We are currently seeking Research Interns on a fixed-term basis (6 months) to enhance our research and development initiatives at SupraOracles.      The selected individuals for this role will be responsible for delving into our existing code base, proposing enhancements to bolster its testability through activities like crafting mocks and drivers, establishing fuzzing environments, implementing coverage measurements, integrating code-contracts, and when needed, restructuring portions of the code base.      Furthermore, the successful candidates will collaborate closely with a distinguished research team composed of both current and past graduates, as well as esteemed faculty members from renowned universities. This team is at the forefront of their respective fields, contributing to a rich and dynamic environment of innovation and excellence.        Responsibilities        Learning relevant tools/libraries      Prepare an infrastructure set up for automated testing and fuzzing      Develop relevant drivers and mocks for critical modules          The ideal candidate for us has          Very good command over Rust programming      Knowledge and experience with Rust testing tools and testing methodologies      Pro-active communication and collaboration abilities with proficiency in written and oral English      Minimum of a Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent, with consideration for candidates in their final year of studies.          Desirable    :        Knowledge of fuzzing      Knowledge of code contracts      Async programming/ tokio runtime in Rust          Internship Duration    :          Up to 6 months based on mutual agreement            Diversity and Inclusion:          SupraOracles is committed to promote diversity and be inclusive without any compromise on the merit.              Whats In It For You          You will have the opportunity to work for a fast-growing start-up within a diverse team where you can make a large impact by doing meaningful work.          You will work in a fully remote environment with flexible hours to work from anywhere in the world.          We offer a competitive base salary for full-time salary based positions (option to be paid in crypto) + Tokens (Equity)          Flexible PTO, sick leave, and unpaid time off.          Paid National Holidays (specific to your country).          We offer medical, vision, and dental for our employees.          Getting Started with SupraOracles        Get familiar with your team, the business, our vision, mission and our strategies for success.      Up-skill as necessary to become familiar with the rapidly changing arena of DeFi creators and projects.      Understand our core values.      Set up 1-1 with your colleagues.      Become familiar with the tools and processes we use.      Analyze our product offerings.      Jump in and be a part of the conversations

Tech LOCATION:                              BATHINDA   AM Technical Services Petchem Units:- Cracker JOB PURPOSE  Track and monitor plant performance of process units      against safe operating limits, operating targets and regulatory approval      limits.  Work closely with Operations team for troubleshooting      and rectifying operational problems. Highlight all operational      deficiencies. Assist Manager for developing parameters, guidelines      and developing technical solutions. Prepare regular reports and non-regular reports,      presentations, SOPs, KPIs, EPIs, to be shared with other departments and      management. Involve in process improvement studies, performance optimization,      incident investigations (RCA), economic evaluations, technical audits and      safety studies. Ensure all process changes in the unit are carried out in      accordance with standard procedures and guidelines. Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams on best      practices, engineering guidelines and technical procedures. Complete all required training and work according to      KPIs envisaged. Review various details of the projects during the      engineering, design and construction and operation phase from a process      perspective. Assist in pre-commissioning, commissioning, and HAZOP      studies.   Area Key Activities   Ensure performance of Cracker Units Assist         in developing operational parameters and guidelines for running the         unit/specific areas as required Assist         in developing quality parameters for final products Measure         and track unit performance Prepare         regular reports related to Unit performance /catalyst monitoring and         track Unit performance to achieve best in class operation Work         closely with unit supervisors/Operations team for         optimization/troubleshooting of assigned Unit(s)   Troubleshooting Work closely with operations team to         identify operational problems Assist in developing technical solutions          Troubleshooting of problems in refinery         units  Prepare reports and compile list of         typical problems and solutions Conduct incident investigation in the         assigned Unit and prepare root cause analysis report to avoid         recurrence of incidents   Review all diagrams/datasheets etc. during engineering,   design and operation phase for projects Review        diagrams (PFDs, P&IDs, ISOs/3D Models, GAs) and datasheets for        specific unit/area of refinery Operate        process simulation software, exchanger design software etc. Prepare        detailed comments and questions for further discussion with        Manager/PMC/Licensor   Pre-commissioning/ Commissioning/ Operations Assist        in carrying out pre-commissioning and commissioning activities as        required Conduct        Performance Test Runs   Others Be        observant during all situations and highlight issues/problems to Manager Complete        all mandatory training  Attend        necessary meeting, prepare minutes of meeting and assist Manager in        preparation of SOPs, MOCs, KPIs, EPIs, notes, excel programs, reports,        and presentations. Educational Qualifications: The applicant should have a first class degree in Chemical Engineering from a reputed college. Experience:  The applicant must have experience of 5-10 years in Process Engineering / Technical Services/Operations department of Cracker Unit with at least 3 - 4 years experience in extensive troubleshooting /Monitoring of  Cracker  as Process Engineer. Skills and Knowledge: Should have basic      knowledge of Software tools for Process Engineering. Ability to analyze and      solve problems for plant process troubleshooting, performance optimization      and continuous improvement. Participation in safety      reviews such as HAZOP, SIL etc.

column2: Primarily the Associate Applications Engineer will assist global customers to identify / verify their requirements and specifications and will prepare competitive costings / quotations / tenders that are both technically and commercially accurate, in accordance with Company policies and procedures     The incumbent will interface with both Customers and internal stakeholders including Sales, Engineering and Design to provide support and solutions that meet the needs and expectations of Customers, strengthening relationships and positively impacting the opportunity to win orders globally for Celeros ClydeUnion Pump product line     This position will be based in Bangalore and will support the global teams             Principle Duties and Responsibilities           Liaises with Sales on the Customers requirements and specifications, including the scope, and timing.         Reviews the RFP (Request for Proposal) / tender document to ensure the contractual requirements are adequately defined and determines the Company s capability to meet the specified requirements.         Prepares and submits the techno-commercial offer to Sales as per the offer submission schedule.         Reviews and evaluates the detailed technical specifications for packaged equipment, extracts applicable Customer requirements and translates / communicates the same to sub-contractors, sub-vendors and internal stakeholders.         Obtains quotations for relevant bought-in equipment in accordance with the applicable Supply Chain policies and procedures. Ensures the CPQ tender data and tendering front log are accurately completed and actively managed.         Provides ongoing technical and commercial clarifications as requested by the Customer and internal stakeholders to support successful order placement. Supports with Customer visits during bid clarification / negotiation stages.         Works as a member of the Global Tendering Team to ensure KPI s and Metrics are achieved.           Knowledge, Skills and Abilities           Expert technical knowledge with API multistage Centrifugal Pump and the systems they go in.         A strong commercial focus and negotiation skill.         Positively establishes relationships across multiple locations and copes well with working remotely from the team and other departments.         Responds professionally to all inquiries and remains calm and composed when under pressure.         Is well organized, structured and methodical.         Displays exceptional attention to detail and accuracy, even when handling multiple demands.         Has a proven track record of meeting deadlines while maintaining high performance standards.         Is a team player: committed, reliable, responsible, flexible, helpful, supportive, active listener/ communicator.           Education and Experience           B.E in Mechanical Engineering in full time/ regular course from recognized Institute and university.         2-5 experience as application engineer for API Pumps, preferably in multistage centrifugal pump in Product or EPC MNCs         Experience in reviewing highly detailed specifications and writing comprehensive and accurate bids         Essential knowledge and experience in reviewing highly detailed specifications and writing comprehensive and accurate bids         Experience in the oil gas / power energy / industrial market is mandatory         Strong knowledge of Microsoft packages including Word, Excel and PowerPoint

column2: Supporting technical delivery of Complex multi-disciplinary Highways engineering projects.      Undertake designs, production and review of design including 3D Models, drawings, calculations, reports and specifications. Supporting the team as required in the development of design solutions.      Compliance with Quality, Safety, Environment, and governance procedures, thus ensuring work produced is technically accurate and delivered in accordance with the appropriate standards.      Supervise and oversee design, modelling and detailing including    production of Civil3D, Open roads Models    and    extraction of information directly from the model to form 2D drawings, schedules, setting out, quantities and other deliverables    .      Supporting the preparation of specifications for construction, technical surveys, and design. Supporting the preparation of tender and contract documentation to various forms of contract.      Serve as a reviewer and a technical auditor to ensure technical assurance. Undertake self-checking and assist with technical checks of work undertaken by the team. Provide quality control for compliance to company/project standards of deliverables.      Manage the Highways discipline 3D models, review model quality and technical content including clash detection and compliance with the BEP.      Work with the Information Manager and project teams to assist in the development and implementation of BIM strategies, BIM Execution Plans, workflows, and processes on projects in accordance with Atkins Corporate Standards, Client requirements and industry best practice.      Actively contribute to project design development by contributing to internal coordination, clash detection and design review sessions as well as external presentations to clients.      Provide over the shoulder support for junior staff, mentor and support them through technical training and live project work supervision.          Required skills and experience      -            A Diploma or Bachelor s degree holder in Civil Engineering    with more than    10 years    of experience delivering complex civil engineering projects, preferably from the Highways domain.      Experience in applying Level 2 BIM on projects and compliance to ISO 19650 standards. Knowledge of    AASHTO, MUTCD and Roadside Design Guide.        Having experience working for US projects is mandatory.      Having US working visa would be an added advantage.      Experience of designing highway engineering solutions in accordance with the AASHTO or other equivalent international standards that are; ready for construction, embrace innovation and offer sustainable solutions to achieve project objectives.      Experience in all aspects of highway design including geometric design of links and all types of junctions using    OpenRoads, MicroStation, Civil 3D 2020 and Infraworks 2020    .      Preparation of reports such as feasibility studies, method statements, specifications, approval documents, design reports, schedules, construction drawings and bills of quantities      Experience in planning, costing and monitoring delivery of work packages within budget and programme and a working knowledge of the management of project finances by use of the change control process.      Must be an advanced or expert user in Autodesk Civil3D / Bentley Open Roads Designer tools with a minimum of    5 years of core experience    .      BIM experience must include detailed understanding of the above tool s user interface and all its features to perform corridor modelling for complex junctions and interchanges.      Must be able to create, manage and manipulate bespoke Civil3D styles to derive various alignment and corridor information, annotation and reporting. Must be able to derive and extract drawing deliverables, schedules, quantity take off and analysis results.      Highly IT literate, excellent command of standard Microsoft office software, knowledge of IT infrastructure and hardware. Excellent skills in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel.      Professional accreditation preferred, with US recognized professional Institutions.      Must be an advanced user or expert user in Autodesk Navisworks with capabilities to federate individual discipline BIM Models. Setup, maintain and run clash rules and clash tests across federated BIM Models. Must know how to create search sets, query, find and navigate through BIM Models.      Must be able to use Navisworks to generate clash results, manage clash resolution, redline BIM Models, capture viewpoints and cascade reports to discipline teams. Must be able to perform Navisworks model management.      Hands-on experience of industry standard Highways    BIM Platforms such as Autodesk Infraworks and Bentley Openroads.        Computational / Generative design tool experience such as Autodesk Dynamo or Bentley Generative Components.      Technical proficiency in the use of the latest common CDE systems: Bentley ProjectWise and Autodesk BIM360 or ACC. Understanding and experience of handling Civil3D Data Shortcuts within the CDE Environment is a must.          Required attributes -          High performing ability to work and integrate into multi-disciplinary teams and work independently. Ensuring your work is to the highest appropriate standards and in compliance with Atkins quality systems and standards.      Energetic and enthusiastic, with the desire to take on extra responsibilities and constantly upskilling team and oneself.      Excellent written and spoken English communication within a business environment.      Ability to exercise initiative, take ownership of project issues and work independently with excellent time management skills.      You will demonstrate a high level of commitment, flexibility and be eager to accept responsibility and learn new skills, whilst always exercising an active interest in helping to solve technical problems faced by any member of the team.      You will act with integrity and professionalism, gaining the trust of colleagues and setting an example to junior staff.

column2: Company Description Aurassure Private Limited is a company that provides environmental monitoring solutions for air pollution, urban flood, weather, and climate change. The company aims to raise awareness and promote sustainable development by providing real-time data, visualizations, trends, predictions, and alerts through its hardware and software platforms. Aurassure Private Limited has deployed its devices in various smart cities and has collaborated with global organizations, developmental agencies, NGOs, and researchers. Role Description This is a full-time on-site role as a Senior Embedded Developer at Aurassure located in Bhubaneswar. The Senior Embedded Developer will be responsible for day-to-day tasks associated with firmware development, ESP architecture, programming, embedded software, and debugging. Responsibilities Develop, design, and implement embedded applications. Prepares appropriate documentation as required by internal product development processes. Conducts and participates in design, code, and test reviews and inspections, as well as the feasibility, efficacy, and compliance with functional and regulatory standards. Collaborates with distributed, cross-functional teams to ensure products meet quality, performance, scalability, reliability, and schedule goals. Investigate software, hardware, and system problems using a variety of techniques and provide innovative solutions. Conduct and participate in reviews and inspections for all elements in the firmware lifecycle to ensure that our code quality and customer satisfaction goals are achieved. Design and Build testing cases and processes for firmware. Integrate and validate new product designs. Provide post-production support. Qualifications B.Tech. / M.Tech. (relevant stream) Good knowledge in the firmware development field with more than 4+ years of experience Basic knowledge of software life cycle, algorithm, and data structure. Excellent knowledge of OS, coding techniques, IP protocols, interfaces, and hardware subsystems Adequate knowledge of reading schematics and data sheets for components. Ability to understand the electrical schematics and work closely with the electrical team. Experience with Real-Time Operating Systems and Embedded Linux. Experience with ESP32 and ESP IDF is mandatory Mode of network connectivity - good idea about GSM/GPRS, WiFi, and Ethernet. TCP, MQTT, and HTTP mode of connection will be a big plus Protocols Like UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, MODBUS, TCP/IP, USB, Bluetooth. Should have experience in working with TFT and LED displays with LGVL libs. Additional experience in microcontroller/microprocessor (like ARM Cortex M, and STM Chips) is plus. Familiarity with Version management tools, defect tracking tools, and peer review (GIT) History of driving project execution and timely delivery while ensuring a quality focus. Experience in Agile development processes and philosophies. Strong documentation and writing skills Mandatory Skills Basics of embedded system development Embedded C/C++ Embedded Linux Espressif IDF for ESP32 chips FreeRTOS Scripting Lang - Python Basics of wireless communication Strong Problem-Solving Skills Analytical Skills (Good Aptitude) Communication Skills  You can apply for this position or explore additional current openings at aurassure.com/career

column2: Project Planning: Project Engineers participate in the initial project planning phase. They work with stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. They develop project schedules, budgets, and resource allocation plans. Design and Development: Depending on the field (civil engineering, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, etc.), Project Engineers may be involved in designing systems, structures, components, or products. They collaborate with design teams, draft plans, and ensure compliance with relevant codes and standards. Coordination: Project Engineers serve as the point of contact between different teams, departments, and stakeholders involved in the project. They facilitate communication and collaboration to ensure everyone is working toward the same goals. Resource Management: Project Engineers allocate and manage resources such as personnel, materials, equipment, and budget. They monitor resource utilization and make adjustments as needed to keep the project on track. Risk Management: Identifying potential risks and developing strategies to mitigate them is a crucial aspect of a Project Engineer's role. They anticipate challenges, implement risk reduction measures, and develop contingency plans. Quality Assurance: Project Engineers are responsible for maintaining the quality of work throughout the project lifecycle. They establish quality control processes, conduct inspections, and ensure that work meets specifications and standards.
column11: site execution, project management, mechanical engineering, quality control, electrical engineering, engineering, autocad, site supervision, civil engineering, site engineering, project execution, project engineering, project planning, inspection

column2: System Integration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including mechanical engineers, systems engineers, and software engineers, to ensure seamless integration of avionics subsystems into the satellite platform. Testing and Validation: Define and execute comprehensive test plans and procedures to validate avionics and electrical systems performance, ensuring compliance with specifications and safety standards. Proficient in designing and developing avionics systems, electrical circuits, and subsystems.     Strong knowledge of electrical engineering principles, including analog and digital circuit design, power electronics, and electromagnetic compatibility (EMC).     Experience with electrical design tools, such as eCAD software such as Altium, circuit simulation software such as LTSpice, and PCB design tools.     Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to analyze complex electrical and avionics engineering problems, identify innovative solutions, and implement effective troubleshooting techniques.     Team Player: Proven ability to collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams, communicate complex technical concepts, and work towards shared project goals.     Attention to Detail: Strong attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work while adhering to project deadlines and budget constraints. Ability to debug complex problems using typical tools such as Logic Analyzer, Oscilloscopes, Spectrum Analyzers.     Adaptability: Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment, adapting to changing priorities and technologies.     Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to convey technical information and collaborate with stakeholders at various levels.     Very strong communication, teamwork and organizational skills     Ability to work effectively across multi-disciplinary teams

column2: We are looking for highly experienced engineers for a senior role in Power System Study discipline, as we look to grow the team in line with business requirements     So, if you are interested in working for an internationally renowned consultancy and working on some of the challenging projects across USA come and join us at AtkinsR alis           About the Role & Responsibilities:           Using your experience and knowledge, you will be leading the delivery of a variety of projects drawing upon the wider team for the technical engineering requirements and building a strong relationship with our clients     You will be client-facing, responsible for the delivery of our work and making sure it meets our client s expectations           You will be taking up the following responsibilities:       In depth knowledge of conducting simulations and analytical studies for transmission and Distribution, Planning, load and generation interconnection, integration of renewables.       Able to prepare simulation study models and carry out power system studies including but not limited to:         Grid compliance studies for Wind, Solar, BESS and Hybrid projects.     Steady state and Dynamic power flow analysis.     Fault Ride Through studies.     Short circuit calculation.     Power quality analysis.     Electro Magnetic Transient Analysis (EMTP) such as Switching and Lightning transient studies, Energization studies etc.     Dynamic simulation of networks involving HVDC, FACTS and inverter-based generation.     Candidate should be able to carry out following protection calculation.     Overcurrent and earth fault protection co-ordination for the transmission and distribution network.     Unit protection calculation for Transformer, motor, busbar, generator etc.     Lead and carry out consulting, research and development study projects.     Analyse study results and recommend solutions as per requirements and able to discuss/clarify Clients with help of results.     Prepare study reports and other technical documentation.     Respond to request for proposals (RFP) by preparing proposals & estimation of man-hours.     Mentoring junior staffs and able to provide training on subject of expertise and present study results to Clients.     Strong conceptualization ability, strong interpersonal communication and organizational skills are a must, including the capability to explain and resolve complex technical issues, critical thinking and decision-making ability. Candidate must have good oral and written communication skills, be willing to travel, and work successfully in a customer focused, project-oriented environment.         Mandatory Requirements:         Masters / bachelor s degree in electrical engineering with 15+ years of relevant industrial experience.     Knowledge of Grid Codes and Power Electronic Converters.     Expertise in system study software s such as PSCAD, DIgSILENT, ETAP, SKM, CDEGS etc.     Knowledge of applicable industry standards including the National Electric Code (NEC), National Electric Safety Code (NESC), IEC and IEEE.         Desirable Requirements:         Knowledge of PSSE, MATLAB / Simulink and any other system study software.     Working experience in Transmission & Distribution projects for USA Competency in Python coding.

column2: Focus on RAMS (Reliability, Availability, Maintainability, andSafety) typically involves leading and overseeing the RAMS activities withinproject or organization.          Plays a critical role in improving equipment and systemreliability and availability.          Deep understanding of engineering principles, statisticalanalysis, and risk assessment methodologies          Contribute to the success and competitiveness of theorganization by improving product performance, reducing downtime, andminimizing risks associated with system operation.              Principal Accountabilities              RAMS Analysis: Conducting advanced RAMS analysis of complexsystems, products, or projects to assess their reliability, availability,maintainability, and safety characteristics. This involves utilizingstatistical methods, reliability modeling, and other analytical techniques.          Performance Evaluation: Leading the evaluation of system orproduct performance, identifying areas for improvement, and providingrecommendations for optimizing reliability, availability, maintainability, andsafety.          Risk Management: Developing and implementing risk managementstrategies to identify potential hazards and mitigate risks to ensure safe andreliable operation of systems or products.          Failure Analysis: Conducting failure analysis to determine rootcauses of failures and implementing corrective actions to prevent futureoccurrences.          RAMS Standards and Compliance: Ensuring adherence to industrystandards, regulations, and best practices related to RAMS in the developmentand operation of systems or products.          RAMS Integration: Collaborating with cross-functional teams,including design, engineering, and project management, to integrate RAMSrequirements into the overall project objectives and decision-making process.          Documentation: Preparing comprehensive technical reports anddocumentation related to RAMS analysis, performance assessments, andimprovement initiatives.          Mentoring and Leadership: Providing guidance and mentorship tojunior RAMS engineers and other team members, fostering professional growth anddevelopment.          Continuous Improvement: Identifying opportunities for processimprovements and developing initiatives to enhance RAMS practices andmethodologies.          RAMS Training: Conducting training sessions for project teamsand stakeholders to enhance their understanding of RAMS concepts, principles,and tools.          RAMS Management: Overseeing the planning, coordination, andexecution of RAMS activities throughout the project lifecycle, ensuring thatRAMS objectives are met.          System Optimization: Collaborating with design and engineeringteams to optimize system design, maintenance strategies, and safety measuresbased on RAMS analysis outcomes.              Desired Skills:                      Bachelor of Engineering/Diploma in Engineering Degree inElectrical/Electronics discipline or its equivalent.          Possesses more than 8-10 years of working experiences in rollingstock and Reliability and Modification job function in Locomotive Maintenance.          Must have competency in Maintenance and Troubleshooting ElectricLocomotive.          Good knowledge of IT systems.          Excellent communicator, both written and oral.          People Management experience.          Well versed in Locomotive Maintenance Strategy          Experienced in Rolling stock RAMS activity.
column11: Automation, Project management, Analytical, Failure analysis, Risk assessment, System design, HTML, Troubleshooting, Continuous improvement, Principal

column2: Job Description: The Technical proposal preparation role is responsible for creating comprehensive and competitive technical machine tool solutions, catering to the specific needs and requirements of clients. This position plays a crucial role in the sales process, contributing to the development of customized solutions and ensuring that clients receive accurate and compelling technical information to make informed purchasing decisions. Key Responsibilities: Client Needs Assessment: Conduct in-depth study of customer requirements / specifications to understand their machine tool requirements, production processes, etc. Machine Tool Selection: Collaborate with the engineering team to select the most suitable machine tools from the product portfolio that align with the client's needs. Technical Solution Design: Develop detailed technical solutions and configurations, including machine tool specifications, features, capabilities, and optional accessories. Cost Estimation: Collaborate with costing team to prepare accurate cost estimates for the proposed machine tool solutions, including the machine itself, installation, training, and any additional services or products. Proposal Development: Create professional and persuasive technical proposals that clearly articulate the benefits and advantages of the proposed machine tool solution, addressing client needs and concerns. Technical Documentation: Compile all necessary technical documentation, schematics, and drawings to support the proposal, ensuring that it aligns with industry standards and regulations. Bid Response: Respond to client inquiries, requests for clarification, or modifications to the initial proposal in a timely and professional manner. Product Knowledge: Stay updated on the latest advancements and features of machine tools and other relevant products, ensuring a strong understanding of the product portfolio. Competitive Analysis: Keep abreast of competitors' offerings and pricing, contributing insights to the pricing strategy and ensuring the competitiveness of proposals. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, engineering, costing and project management, to ensure a seamless transition from proposal to project execution. Customer Support: Provide technical support to clients during the proposal evaluation process, addressing their queries and concerns. Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering, or a related field. Strong technical knowledge of machine tools / industrial equipments and related technologies. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Preferable knowledge of using CAD software for creating technical drawings and schematics. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple proposals simultaneously. Sales acumen and the ability to understand client requirements. Familiarity with industry standards, regulations, and safety protocols. Experience: 4  5 Years for Executive / Engineer post. 7 ??8 Years for Manager post.
column11: Bid Preparation, Techno-commercial

column2: The purpose is to provide service excellence to our OEM customers by effective inter-departmental coordination within the organization. This position will indirectly contribute to business retention in West Region alone.            WHO WE ARE:            VIDEOJET TECHNOLOGIES is a global leader in product identification providing innovative coding and marking solutions that helps customers ensure product safety and improve their productivity.      Videojet is a part of Veralto s Product Quality Innovation companies, which also includes Esko, Linx, Pantone and X-Rite. Together, they help package and protect the world s food, medicine, and essentials, tracing and authenticating billions of goods that travel the global supply chain every day.      Veralto is a global leader in essential technology solutions with annual revenue of nearly $5 billion and a proven track record of solving some of the most complex challenges we face as a society. Our industry-leading companies and globally recognized brands are building on a long-established legacy of innovation and customer trust to create a safer, cleaner, more vibrant future.      Veralto is headquartered in Waltham, Mass. with 13 operating companies and 300+ locations worldwide. Our global team of 16,000 associates is committed to making an enduring positive impact on the world and is united by a powerful purpose: Safeguarding the World s Most Vital Resources .      Imagine a world where everyone has access to clean water, safe food and medicine, and trusted essential goods. That is the tomorrow Veralto (VLTO) is creating today.      Veralto s Water Quality companies Aquatic Informatics, ChemTreat, Hach, McCrometer, OTT HydroMet, Sea-Bird Scientific, Trojan Technologies and XOS help manage, treat, purify, and protect the global water supply, from municipal and industrial wastewater treatment facilities to lakes, rivers, watersheds, and oceans.      Veralto s Product Quality Innovation companies Esko, Linx, Pantone, Videojet, and X-Rite help package and protect the world s food, medicine, and essentials, tracing and authenticating billions of goods that travel the global supply chain every day.            Primary Responsibilities:            This position will assist OEM Tech Mgr      for various tech support related functions in West and central Region including conclusion of Demos, FATs, Trails at OEM place, supporting OEM customers by training OEM teams with service skills for printer s integrations and commissioning, supporting OEMs at their exhibition places, keeping a track record of installation process at end user customers of OEMs to support OEMs in development of some specific brackets and SOPs      Goal achievement measurement will be based on his KPI                Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:            Education - Graduation / Diploma in Engineering with Electronics or Instrumentation.          Work experience - Minimum of 3 Yrs. field service experience in company offering technical Products. Candidate from existing service team or competition or Packaging service field would be preferred.          Skills required -Technical Knowledge to understand the working and maintenance of almost all Marking and Coding solutions. Customer facing skills. Precise execution of technical service activity. CAD Drawing making and / or working on PLC programming would be considered as added advantage.          Travel - Mumbai / Pune as base location, person will also need to travel with in Maharastra and Madya Pradesh. Against special assignments, he may also be asked to visit other part of country.

column1: Advanced Lead Engineer - Production Technologies C&SC
column2: The Advanced Lead Engineer is an individual contributor hardware owning engineer reporting to an Engineering Manager within the Aerospace Engineering Divisions Production Technologies team.          As a hardware owner you will own all engineering functions related to the production of assigned Commercial and Aero-derivative components in the Combustors and Structures commodities.      In this role you will be on the front lines of a new organization that is dedicated to improving the producibility enhancing the Engineering-Supply chain relationship and using SQDC to dramatically improve the health of the supply chain and product to enable the business to fulfil our customers expectations.      Examples of specific tasks you will be responsible for are: producibility design changes on-going manufacturing support and strategic improvements across Castings Forgings Machining and Coatings for the assigned commodity.      You will also be responsible for departmental operations planning/execution or is focused on execution of professional activities within a technical discipline. Functions with some autonomy but guided by established policies or review of end results.      The job allows modification of procedures and practices covering work as long as the end results meet standards of acceptability (quality volume timeliness etc.).                  Job Description              Essential Responsibilities              Utilizes in-depth knowledge of a technical discipline and analytical thinking and technical experience to execute policy/strategy.          Has knowledge of best practices and how own area integrates with others; is aware of the competition and the factors that differentiate them in the market          Uses some judgment and has some ability to propose different solutions outside of set parameters to address more complicated manufacturing processes with technical variety and/or interdependent production cycles. Uses technical experience and analytical thinking. Uses multiple internal and limited external sources outside of own teams to arrive at decisions.          Acts as a resource for colleagues with less experience. May lead small projects with low risks and resource requirements. Explains information; developing skills to bring team members to consensus around topics within field. Conveys performance expectations and may handle sensitive issues.                  Qualifications/Requirements              PhD/ MTech/ MS/ B.Tech in Mechanical/ Aerospace/ Structural Engineering or equivalent          6+ years of relevant experience in relevant engineering role.          Demonstrated ability to lead teams and projects.                  Desired Characteristics              Previous experience in manufacturing especially of Aerospace components.          Demonstrated ability to analyze and resolve problems          Ability to document plan market and execute programs          Effective project management skills          Exposure to Aircraft engines or Gas turbine product knowledge          Ability to build macros/ automation within work area          Ability to start problem solving from first principles hand calculation.          Awareness of Lean/Six-sigma methodologies          Previous experience in design of aviation components.          Certification in ASME Y14 or practical experience with GD&T.
